sub_title: Petroleum Engineer - PP / Decommissioning, Restoration and New Energies Hub - SHELL NETHERLANDS
summary:
üîπ I am a geologist since 2006. I am European and Brazilian, worked as an exploration geologist/ geophysicist in the Mining Industry for 3 years. Moved to the Oil Industry with Schlumberger as a petrophysicist and have been hired by Shell as a petrophysicist. üîπ
Summary experience:
18 years industry experience. 15 years in function Petrophysical Engineering.
I am working as a Petroleum Engineer in abandonment and CCUS projects in NAM - Netherlands. I was coordinating the subsurface decommissioning team for Bijupira and Salema for 2 years and a half before that.
Worked in The Hague (Netherlands) with Petrophysics and supporting Shell Learning Center in several activities such as: generating learning material, class technical instructor, on-line trainings and creating videos about Petrophysics.
Operational experience with horizontal, vertical well planning / execution (including geosteering) and abandonment.
Broad petrophysical knowledge on both clastic and carbonate reservoir system analysis utilizing classical petrophysical techniques.
Knowledge of major Petrophysical software packages applied in the industry for well and reservoir interpretation (database management skills)
Offshore support for exploration and appraisal wells, wireline and LWD witnessing jobs. Familiarity with advanced methods of post core retrieval handling and storage.
Ability to design logging programs in complex reservoir systems, maximizing data acquisition. Proven technical operational insight identifying costs savings while improving operations. ‚ÄúShell best My News award‚Äù.
Working on integrated teams and having the ability to interact effectively with geoscientists and reservoir engineers, operations, drilling and facilities engineers.
Very good in communication & interpersonal skills. 
Good experience on dealing with host country technical authorities / government.
Worked as operated and Non - Operated venture.
Broad Pre-Salt and Deep Water knowledge
